### This Format is for helping report bugs for better tracking and development, please fill out this brief questionnaire to help us resolve the issue you're experiencing. The more details you can provide, the better!

**1.** Is this a new issue? Did you search keywords relating to this issue on our discord bug and suggestion forum? Was there any companion or linking issues? [YES/NO]

- [Link or reference the issue here if applicable]

**2.** Describe the bug and how it's affecting gameplay. Is this a severe bug that is creating a game breaking situation? Where and when did this occur?

**3.** Please describe if possible how to reproduce the bug if possible. If you are unable to properly reproduce the bug, how did you get it to occur to you the first time? Trace back your steps and try to remember what might have caused the bug. Pretend you're writing down a recipe, list all the steps and "ingredients" to re-make the bug in a nice ordered list. Please avoid using generics in descriptions, assume the reader knows nothing about what you're talking about.

**4.** Did this bug produce any errors in the console when it occurs? Please provide if possible a screenshot of the reported errors in the console (~)

**5.** What client are you using and on what kind of a system? Are you running on Windows, Mac, Linux? Are you using the official Wizden client from their website, Steam client, or something else?

**6.** Is there a temporary work around, or a means of avoiding the bug in the meantime while a solution is created?
